title: Waypoint
description: Specification of a navigation point in an exhibit

Point.description: The tail x, y coordinates as a fraction of the full height of image layout

items.description: Coordinate as a fraction of the full height of image layout

Text.description: Text to render at tail of the arrow

Angle.description: Angle in degrees to rotate the arrow from x axis: default is 60

HideArrow.description: The arrow will be hidden if HideArrow is true

x.description: Left of the rectangular overlay as a fraction of the full height of image layout

y.description: Top of the rectangular overlay as a fraction of the full height of image layout

width.description: Width of the rectangular overlay as a fraction of the full height of image layout

height.description: Heigth of the rectangular overlay as a fraction of the full height of image layout

barchart.description: Path to a CSV file with two columns for marker and frequency

oneOf.description: Specification of a heatmap to visualize in the navigation panel

data.description: Path to a CSV file with columns for ClustName, and any number of columns for marker and row for cluster

colorTicks.description: Number of distinct colors to use in the heatmap

colormapInvert.description: Will range from dark navy to bright yellow from low to high if true

oneOf.description: Path to a CSV file with columns for ClustName, and any number of columns for marker and row for cluster

scatterplot.description: Specification of a scatterplot to visualize in the navigation panel

data.description: Path to a CSV file with columns for Cell_ID, clust_ID, X_position, Y_position, and two columns for the axes

axes.description: Specification to define two columns for the axes

x.description: Name of the CSV column for the x axis in the scatterplot

y.description: Name of the CSV column for the y axis in the scatterplot

clusters.description: Specification of clusters, with one cluster defined per clust_ID in the CSV file

labels.description: List of plain text labels for each clust_ID in the CSV file

items.description: Plain text label for a single cluster

colors.description: List of color hex strings for each clust_ID in the CSV file

items.description: Hex string identifying 3-byte RGB color to assign to cluster
Plain text label for a single cluster

Name.description: Name of the waypoint for display in navigation UI

Description.description: A markdown string to render when the waypoint is activated

Group.description: ID of a marker group to render when the waypoint is activated

Zoom.description: The ratio of full image width over the screen width

Pan.description: The center x, y coordinates as a fraction of the full height of image layout

items.description: Coordinate as a fraction of the full width of image layout

Overlays.description: List of rectangular overlays for the waypoint

Arrows.description: List of arrows for the waypoint

Polygon.description: LZString encoded comma separated x, y coordinates of lasso-style polygon

Masks.description: List of IDs of segmentation mask that can be activated for the current waypoint

items.description: ID of segmentation mask to include in toggle UI for the current waypoint

ActiveMasks.description: List of IDs of segmentation mask to activate by default for the current waypoint

items.description: ID of segmentation mask to toggle by default in the UI for the current waypoint
